fields.name: Bench Press
fields.description: A compound exercise for building upper body strength.
fields.instructions: Lie on a flat bench and lower the bar to your chest. Press it back up.

fields.name: Squat
fields.description: A fundamental lower-body exercise for strength and stability.
fields.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips, and return to standing.

fields.name: Deadlift
fields.description: A total-body strength movement focused on posterior chain development.
fields.instructions: Hinge at the hips, grip the barbell, and lift it by extending your hips and knees.

fields.name: Pull-Up
fields.description: A bodyweight pulling exercise that strengthens the upper body.
fields.instructions: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip and pull your chin above the bar.

fields.name: Lunges
fields.description: A unilateral lower-body movement improving balance and strength.
fields.instructions: Step forward, lower yourself until both knees form 90-degree angles, then push back up.

fields.name: Plank
fields.description: A core stability exercise that strengthens the entire midsection.
fields.instructions: Hold your body in a straight line on your elbows and toes while engaging your core.

fields.name: Shoulder Press
fields.description: An overhead pressing movement to build shoulder strength.
fields.instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height and press them overhead, then lower.

fields.name: Bicep Curl
fields.description: An isolation exercise to strengthen the biceps.
fields.instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing up and curl them towards your shoulders.

fields.name: Triceps Dips
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the triceps.
fields.instructions: Grip parallel bars, lower your body by bending elbows, then push back up.

fields.name: Calf Raises
fields.description: An isolation movement for calf muscle development.
fields.instructions: Stand on a flat surface and raise your heels as high as possible, then lower.

fields.name: Russian Twists
fields.description: A rotational core exercise to enhance stability.
fields.instructions: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, twist your torso side to side while holding a weight.

fields.name: Jump Rope
fields.description: A cardio exercise that improves coordination and endurance.
fields.instructions: Jump continuously over a rope, keeping your feet together.

fields.name: Burpees
fields.description: A high-intensity full-body conditioning movement.
fields.instructions: Start standing, drop into a squat, kick feet back, do a push-up, and jump up.

fields.name: Kettlebell Swing
fields.description: A power exercise focused on hip drive.
fields.instructions: Swing the kettlebell forward using a hip hinge, then let it return.

fields.name: Mountain Climbers
fields.description: A dynamic core and cardio movement.
fields.instructions: Start in a plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly.

fields.name: Leg Raises
fields.description: An isolation exercise for lower abdominal strength.
fields.instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs while keeping them straight, then lower slowly.

fields.name: Face Pulls
fields.description: A shoulder exercise improving posture and stability.
fields.instructions: Use a cable machine, pull the rope towards your face while keeping elbows high.

fields.name: Chest Fly
fields.description: An isolation movement for chest development.
fields.instructions: Lie on a bench with dumbbells, lower arms out, then bring them back together.

fields.name: Seated Row
fields.description: A pulling movement for back development.
fields.instructions: Sit at a cable machine, pull the handle towards your torso, then extend arms.

fields.name: Box Jumps
fields.description: A plyometric exercise to improve explosive power.
fields.instructions: Jump onto a sturdy box, land softly, then step down.
